name: NodeJS/BatteryProfile/battery-level-characteristic.js
util
description:
Class BatteryLevelCharacteristic extends bleno.Characteristic class
BatteryLevelCharacteristic include operating system calls to get actual battery level
Uses SIG defined UUID for the characteristic

name: BatteryLevelCharacteristic
description:
Constructor for BatteryLevelCharacteristic calls constructor from the parent class Characteristic
Defines the UUID for the characteristic
Includes descriptors used

name: onReadRequest
description:
Override prototype method onReadRequest from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master initiates an onReadRequest on the battery level characteristic.
We check the os if the application runs on linux, and if so, return the actual battery level

name: NodeJS/BatteryProfile/battery-service.js
util
description:
Class BatterySerice extends bleno.PrimaryService class
Main class for the battery service including 
BatteryLevelCharacteristic.
The battery service sets the UUID to the SIG defined value.

name: BatteryService
description:
Constructor for BatteryService calls constructor from the parent class PrimaryService
Defines the UUID for the service
Includes characteristics used

name: NodeJS/HeartRateProfile/body-sensor-location-characteristic.js
util
description:
Class BodySensorLocationCharacteristic extends bleno.Characteristic class
BodySensorLocationCharacteristic shows user information about the sensor location the body.
Uses SIG defined UUID for the characteristic

name: BodySensorLocationCharacteristic
description:
Constructor for BodySensorLocationCharacteristic calls constructor from the parent class Characteristic
Defines the UUID for the characteristic
Includes descriptors used

name: onReadRequest
description:
Override prototype method onReadRequest from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master initiates an onReadRequest on the body sensor location characteristic.
Creates a random number between 0 and 7 which are used for the position on the body

name: NodeJS/HeartRateProfile/heart-rate-measurement-characteristic.js
util
description:
Class HeartRateMeasurementCharacteristic extends bleno.Characteristic class
HeartRateMeasurementCharacteristic shows user information about the sensor location the body.
Uses SIG defined UUID for the characteristic

name: HeartRateMeasurementCharacteristic
description:
Constructor for HeartRateMeasurementCharacteristic calls constructor from the parent class Characteristic
Defines the UUID for the characteristic
Includes descriptors used

name: onSubscribe
description:
Override prototype method onSubscribe from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master subscribes to the characteristic so it gets a new value every 2s interval.
Creates a random number between 1 and 6 and adds or substrats the value form the heartRate value

name: onUnsubscribe
description:
Override prototype method onUnsubscrib from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master unsubscribes from the characteristic.
Interval is cleared and no data will be transmitted

name: NodeJS/HeartRateProfile/heart-rate-service.js
util
description:
Class HeartRateService extends bleno.PrimaryService class
Main class for the heart rate service including 
HeartRateMeasurementCharacteristic
BodySensorLocationCharacteristic
The heart rate service sets the UUID to the SIG defined value.

name: HeartRateService
description:
Constructor for HeartRateService calls constructor from the parent class PrimaryService
Defines the UUID for the service
Includes characteristics used

name: NodeJS/IPAddressProfile/ip-address-characteristic.js
util
description:
Class IPAddressCharacteristic extends bleno.Characteristic class
IPAddressCharacteristic include child process calls to get actual ip address
IPAddressCharacteristic is a self defined test characteristic

name: IPAddressCharacteristic
description:
Constructor for IPAddressCharacteristic calls constructor from the parent class Characteristic
Defines the UUID for the characteristic
Includes descriptors used

name: onReadRequest
description:
Override prototype method onReadRequest from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master initiates an onReadRequest on the battery level characteristic.
We check the os if the application runs on linux, and if so, return the actual battery level

name: NodeJS/IPAddressProfile/ip-address-service.js
util
description:
Class IPAddressService extends bleno.PrimaryService class
Main class for the IPAddressService including 
IPAddressCharacteristic.
IPAddressService is a self defined service for test purposes.

name: IPAddressService
description:
Constructor for IPAddressService calls constructor from the parent class PrimaryService
Defines the UUID for the service
Includes characteristics used

name: NodeJS/ThermometerProfile/temperature-measurement-characteristic.js
util
description:
Class TemperatureMeasurementCharacteristic extends bleno.Characteristic class
TemperatureMeasurementCharacteristic shows user information about the sensor location the body.
Uses SIG defined UUID for the characteristic

name: TemperatureMeasurementCharacteristic
description:
Constructor for TemperatureMeasurementCharacteristic calls constructor from the parent class Characteristic
Defines the UUID for the characteristic
Includes descriptors used

name: onSubscribe
description:
Override prototype method onSubscribe from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master subscribes to the characteristic so it gets a new value every 2s interval.
Creates a random number between 35.00 and 40.00 to simulate the body temperature

name: onUnsubscribe
description:
Override prototype method onUnsubscrib from class bleno.Characteristic 
This method is called if the master unsubscribes from the characteristic.
Interval is cleared and no data will be transmitted

name: NodeJS/ThermometerProfile/thermometer-service.js
util
description:
Class ThermometerService extends bleno.PrimaryService class
Main class for the ThermometerService including 
HeartRateMeasurementCharacteristic
BodySensorLocationCharacteristic
The heart rate service sets the UUID to the SIG defined value.

name: ThermometerService
description:
Constructor for ThermometerService calls constructor from the parent class PrimaryService
Defines the UUID for the service
Includes characteristics used

name: NodeJS/documentation/script/inherited-summary.js
NodeJS/documentation/script/inner-link.js
NodeJS/documentation/script/manual.js
NodeJS/documentation/script/patch-for-local.js
NodeJS/documentation/script/prettify/prettify.js

NodeJS/main.js
bleno
description:
Main class for the BLE-Simulator
includes module bleno for the BLE communication
Creates service objects which will be advertised to master devices
If a master connects to a service it can send onRead- onWriteRequest
and subscribe and unsubscribe to notifications
